channel.title: RSCEmulation
channel.description:
RSCEmulation is a RuneScape Classic private server that is 3 years old in August 2012. We've been the leader in RSC private servers for a long time now, known for stability and security.
URL: http://www.rscemulation.net
Thread: http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,403060.0.html Replies: 1,774 Views: 87,389
I'm requesting approval to continue advertising on Mopar like I have been for nearly 3 years with no problems. :)

item.title: RSCEmulation
item.dc:creator: @mod_taharok Taharok
item.description:
@mod_taharok wrote:

Yes. I can say with certainty this is allowed. Thank you for requesting it so quickly!

item.title: RSCEmulation

item.description:
@Kryptix wrote:

Si Force:

I personally don’t see any problems with this. I’m going to wait for a few more opinions before it’s approved though.

Probably for the best, it’s only been actively linked for 3 years now with no moderators taking any action against it… lol
